name: queryVm
description: Get summary of all the VMs.

effective_sla_domain_id.description: Filter by ID of effective SLA Domain.

primary_cluster_id.description: Filter by primary cluster ID, or **local**.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: Ignore these many matches in the beginning.

is_relic.description: Filter by the isRelic field of the virtual machine. When this parameter is not set, return both relic and non-relic virtual machines.

name.description: Search by using a virtual machine name.

moid.description: Search by using a virtual machine managed object ID.

sla_assignment.description: Filter by SLA Domain assignment type.

guest_os_name.description: Filters by the name of operating system using infix search.

sort_by.description: Sort results based on the specified attribute.

sort_order.description: Sort order, either ascending or descending.
